answers.answer: Hello,Ringworm is caused by a fungus on the skin, and this can happen more frequently in people with diabetes but is not actually CAUSED by diabetes.You can try some over the counter fungal creams like Lotrimin, but it is best to have a doctor look at it as you may need a stronger prescription fungal cream.
Waiting for an answer to the question above that I asked.

question: I have several things on my arms only that look like ringworm. I was told that it was caused by being diabetic. What can be appliedon these break outs to get rid of them?
title: Skin
